description:
Gozu is a finder of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. He is very fearful, and kind at heart, seeing that he cried over a http://anidb.net/ch32760 [witch]`s death.
Gozu is almost killed by Akuma and he is saved by http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda]. They then go to investigate in Daukern about the witch and the forest where she resides.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Gozu
